about_the_game:
Generating all the box art for your game can be a tedious time consuming process, especially if you support multiple languages. Turn a 20 minute task into a 20 second task and allow Art Boxer to optimise your workflow for free today.

You’ll wish you always did it like this:

1. Add a background & logo

2. Set your output folder

3. Press generate

Based on the dimension presets you have selected, box art files are immediately generated, ready for deployment.

Documentation:

Please see the guides on the community hub for both a quick guide, and also a much more indepth guide that covers all the features of the software.

Fast feedback:

Make minor adjustments to the preset and press export to see the change immediately.

Preset customisation:

Art boxer is configured for use with Steam, but you can make your own export templates for other websites too. Each exported image can be customised with the following criteria:

- Canvas width

- Canvas height

- Background visible

- Background scale

- Background offset

- Background alignment (9 positions)
- Logo scale

- Logo alignment (9 positions)

- Logo padding

- Logo visible

- Filename

License:

✔ Personal use

✔ Commercial use

Using this software does not strip an image of its copyright or license, nor does it impose any further restrictions. Images exported by Art Boxer are bound by the same license they held prior to being exported.

Limitations:

- Only PNG is supported

- No images larger than 4096x4096
